body.p: Mr gov it is a report to me that i am promoted from a private in the 1st ky scouts to a capt to Command the Battry at the ft if so i should like a Comision to make a co for the term of six Months you will pleas let me no this evning through gen D. W. Linsey

yours truly
P J sparks privat 1st ky scouts

Ky State Militia
Frankfort Jun 13 -- /64
Sparks P. J.
private in 1st ky scouts.

Desires permission to raise an Art. Co for the 6 months service
Rec. J. G. O June 13, 1864
An Artillery Co ought to be raised for six months
I have authorized Lt Bayless to raise an artillery co. & this never may be of assistance

Thos E Bramlette
for
Inspector Genl
